messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: I will oppose a divisive second referendum. I will fight for a better deal for pensioners. I will seek more investment for Dunfermline and West Fife to create jobs and opportunities. I will fight for the replacement of Woodmill, St Columba’s and Inverkeithing High Schools with the modern state of the art facilities our children need and deserve. I will always put Dunfermline & West Fife first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will oppose a divisive second referendum and advocate for investment in schools, public services, and NHS.
Fight for a better deal for pensioners, vote to protect the Triple-Lock on state pensions, deliver justice for the WASPI women.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investment in Dunfermline and West Fife
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Create jobs and opportunities, including development of Rosyth Waterfront and railway links for Kincardine and Halbeath.
Fight for the modern state of the art facilities for Woodmill, St Columba’s and Inverkeithing High Schools that children need and deserve.
Always put Dunfermline & West Fife first, work for the many and fight a second independence referendum.

issues.economy: Investment in schools, public services, and NHS.
issues.education: Fight for the replacement of Woodmill, St Columba’s and Inverkeithing High Schools with modern state of the art facilities.
issues.transport: Seek more investment in transport infrastructure including railway links.
issues.socialWelfare: Fight for a better deal for pensioners, protect Triple-Lock on state pensions, deliver justice for WASPI women.

community.content: Our area needs a local champion who will work for the many, not the few, and fight a second independence referendum.

images.caption: Cara Hilton standing in front of a bridge.

examples: I will oppose a divisive second referendum.
I will fight for a better deal for pensioners.
I will seek more investment for Dunfermline and West Fife to create jobs and opportunities.
I will fight for the replacement of Woodmill, St Columba’s and Inverkeithing High Schools with the modern state of the art facilities our children need and deserve.
I will always put Dunfermline & West Fife first.
Our area needs a local champion who will work for the many, not the few, and fight a second independence referendum.
Create jobs and opportunities, including development of Rosyth Waterfront and railway links for Kincardine and Halbeath.
Fight for the replacement of Woodmill, St Columba’s and Inverkeithing High Schools with modern state of the art facilities.
Always put Dunfermline & West Fife first.
Our area needs a local champion who will work for the many, not the few, and fight a second independence referendum.
Oppose a divisive second referendum and advocate for investment in schools, public services, and NHS.
Nicola Sturgeon should get back to the day job of investing in our schools, improving our public services, and sorting out our NHS.
